channel.title: Tall Order on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tall Order on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lenovo ThinkBook Plus Gen 6 Rollable Review: Like Magic
item.description: This laptop can magically expand its screen vertically by 50 percent at the touch of a button. Turns out, that’s a lot more useful than you’d expect.
